languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, отец и правда выжил. Пираты действительно захватили его в плен и собирались требовать выкуп, но Имперский флот сумел взять корабль на абордаж и спасти отца. Когда он пропал, наша матушка, леди Моллес, успела выправить справку до того, как пришли добрые вести. И теперь мы вынуждены унизительно доказывать, что отец жив, пока матушка припеваючи живет с новым мужем, лордом Секандасом, забрав себе семейное дело. Мы умоляем вернуть лорду Моллесу жизнь и доброе имя! Он смиренно ожидает вашего решения в капелле долготерпения".
languages.translation_comment: Кадр на левую сторону весов. Там стоят VP_LordMollesJr_male_name и VP_LadyMollesJr_female_name. После куя помощник кладет на чашу кольцо.
Кадр на левую сторону весов. Там стоят VP_LordMollesJr_male_name и VP_LadyMollesJr_female_name. После куя помощник кладет на чашу кольцо.

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, our father did survive. He really was captured by pirates, who were going to demand ransom, but the Imperial Navy managed to board the ship and rescue him. After he went missing, our mother, Lady Molles, arranged for a death certificate before we received the good news. Now, we are in the humiliating position of having to prove that our father is alive, while our mother is living with her new husband, Lord Secundas, and has taken over our family business. We implore you to restore Lord Molles to his life and name! He is humbly awaiting your decision in the Chapel of Patience."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, отец и правда выжил. Пираты действительно захватили его в плен и собирались требовать выкуп, но Имперский флот сумел взять корабль на абордаж и спасти отца. Когда он пропал, наша матушка, леди Моллес, успела выправить справку до того, как пришли добрые вести. И теперь мы вынуждены унизительно доказывать, что отец жив, пока матушка припеваючи живет с новым мужем, лордом Секандасом, забрав себе семейное дело. He really was captured by pirates who were going to demand ransom, but the Imperial Navy managed to board the ship and rescue him. After he went missing, our mother, Lady Molles, arranged for a death certificate before we got the good news. Now we are in the humiliating position of having to prove that our father is alive, while our mother is living her best life with her new husband, Lord Secandas, and has taken over our family business. We implore you to restore Lord Molles to his life and his name! He is humbly awaiting your decision in the Chapel of Patience."

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, unser Vater hat überlebt. Er wurde in der Tat von Piraten entführt, die Lösegeld für ihn fordern wollten, aber die imperiale Kriegsflotte konnte ihr Schiff entern und ihn befreien. Nach seinem Verschwinden hat unsere Mutter, Lady Molles, einen Totenschein erwirkt, ehe wir die gute Nachricht erhielten. Nun sind wir in der demütigenden Position, beweisen zu müssen, dass unser Vater noch lebt, während unsere Mutter mit ihrem neuen Ehemann, Lord Secundas, zusammenlebt und unser Familiengeschäft übernommen hat. Wir flehen Euch an, Lord Molles sein Leben und seinen Namen zurückzugeben! Er harrt in der Kapelle der Geduld demütig Eurer Entscheidung."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, our father did survive. He really was captured by pirates, who were going to demand ransom, but the Imperial Navy managed to board the ship and rescue him. After he went missing, our mother, Lady Molles, arranged for a death certificate before we received the good news. Now, we are in the humiliating position of having to prove that our father is alive, while our mother is living with her new husband, Lord Secundas, and has taken over our family business. We implore you to restore Lord Molles to his life and name! He is humbly awaiting your decision in the Chapel of Patience."

Nun sind wir in der demütigenden Position, beweisen zu müssen, dass unser Vater noch lebt, während unsere Mutter mit ihrem neuen Ehemann, Lord Secundas, zusammenlebt und unser Familiengeschäft übernommen hat. Wir flehen Euch an, Lord Molles sein Leben und seinen Namen zurückzugeben! Er harrt in der Kapelle der Geduld demütig Eurer Entscheidung."

"Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, unser Vater hat überlebt. Er wurde in der Tat von Piraten entführt, die Lösegeld für ihn fordern wollten, aber die imperiale Kriegsflotte konnte ihr Schiff entern und ihn befreien. Nach seinem Verschwinden hat unsere Mutter, Lady Molles, einen Totenschein erwirkt, ehe wir die gute Nachricht erhielten. Nun sind wir in der demütigenden Position, beweisen zu müssen, dass unser Vater noch lebt, während unsere Mutter mit ihrem neuen Ehemann, Lord Secundas, in Saus und Braus lebt und unser Familiengeschäft übernommen hat. Wir flehen Euch an, Lord Molles sein Leben und seinen Namen zurückzugeben! Er harrt in der Kapelle der Geduld demütig Eurer Entscheidung."

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, notre père a bel et bien survécu. Il est vrai qu'il s'est fait capturer par des pirates qui comptaient exiger une rançon contre sa libération, mais la Marine Impériale a réussi à aborder le vaisseau et à le sauver. Après sa disparition, notre mère, dame Molles, a fait la demande d'un certificat de décès qui a été délivré avant que nous n'apprenions qu'il avait survécu. Nous voilà dans une situation des plus humiliantes : nous devons prouver que notre père est vivant, tandis que notre mère mène la belle vie avec son nouveau mari, le seigneur Secundas, et contrôle désormais l'entreprise familiale. Nous vous implorons de rendre au seigneur Molles sa vie et son nom ! Il attend humblement votre décision dans la Chapelle de la Patience. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, our father did survive. He really was captured by pirates, who were going to demand ransom, but the Imperial Navy managed to board the ship and rescue him. After he went missing, our mother, Lady Molles, arranged for a death certificate before we received the good news. Now, we are in the humiliating position of having to prove that our father is alive, while our mother is living with her new husband, Lord Secundas, and has taken over our family business. We implore you to restore Lord Molles to his life and name! He is humbly awaiting your decision in the Chapel of Patience."

Nous vous implorons de rendre au seigneur Molles sa vie et son nom ! Il attend humblement votre décision dans la Chapelle de la Patience. »

« Votre Seigneurie, notre père a bel et bien survécu. Il est vrai qu'il s'est fait capturer par des pirates qui comptaient exiger une rançon contre sa libération, mais la Marine Impériale a réussi à aborder le vaisseau et à le sauver. Après sa disparition, notre mère, dame Molles, a fait la demande d'un certificat de décès qui a été délivré avant que nous n'apprenions qu'il avait survécu. Nous voilà dans une situation des plus humiliantes : nous devons prouver que notre père est vivant, tandis que notre mère mène la belle vie avec son nouveau mari, le seigneur Secundas, et contrôle désormais l'entreprise familiale. Nous vous implorons de rendre au seigneur Molles sa vie et son nom ! Il attend humblement votre décision dans la Chapelle de la Patience. »

languages.text: “大人，我们的父亲确实还活着。他确实被海盗抓走了，还被勒索了一笔赎金，但在那之后，帝国海军把他救了出来。父亲失踪之后，我们的母亲莫莱斯夫人在我们收到这个好消息之前，就安排好了父亲的死亡证明。如今，我们不得不想办法证明我们的父亲还活着，而我们的母亲却和她的新任丈夫塞孔达斯勋爵跑到了一起，还接管了我们的家族生意，这实在是太羞辱人了。我们恳请您恢复莫莱斯勋爵的名誉！他本人就在恒毅教堂，谦卑地等待着您的决定。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, our father did survive. He really was captured by pirates, who were going to demand ransom, but the Imperial Navy managed to board the ship and rescue him. After he went missing, our mother, Lady Molles, arranged for a death certificate before we received the good news. Now, we are in the humiliating position of having to prove that our father is alive, while our mother is living with her new husband, Lord Secundas, and has taken over our family business. We implore you to restore Lord Molles to his life and name! He is humbly awaiting your decision in the Chapel of Patience."

“大人，我们的父亲确实还活着。他确实被海盗抓走了，还被勒索了一笔赎金，但在那之后，帝国海军把他救了出来。父亲失踪之后，我们的母亲莫莱斯夫人在我们收到这个好消息之前，就安排好了父亲的死亡证明。如今，我们不得不想办法证明我们的父亲还活着，而我们的母亲却和她的新任丈夫塞孔达斯勋爵过着逍遥自在的生活，还接管了我们的家族生意，这实在是太羞辱人了。我们恳请您恢复莫莱斯勋爵的名誉！他本人就在恒毅教堂，谦卑地等待着您的决定。”

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, nuestro padre sobrevivió. Había sido capturado por piratas, que iban a pedir rescate, pero la Armada Imperial logró abordar la nave y rescatarlo. Sin embargo, en el momento de su desaparición, nuestra madre encargó un certificado de defunción antes de que recibiéramos las buenas noticias. Ahora nos vemos en la humillante posición de tener que demostrar que nuestro padre está vivo mientras nuestra madre vive con su nuevo esposo, lord Secundas, y se apodera del negocio familiar. ¡Le rogamos que devuelva a lord Molles su vida y su buen nombre! Espera su decisión en la Capilla de la Paciencia».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, our father did survive. He really was captured by pirates, who were going to demand ransom, but the Imperial Navy managed to board the ship and rescue him. After he went missing, our mother, Lady Molles, arranged for a death certificate before we received the good news. Now, we are in the humiliating position of having to prove that our father is alive, while our mother is living with her new husband, Lord Secundas, and has taken over our family business. We implore you to restore Lord Molles to his life and name! He is humbly awaiting your decision in the Chapel of Patience."

Sin embargo, en el momento de su desaparición, nuestra madre encargó un certificado de defunción antes de que recibiéramos las buenas noticias. Ahora nos vemos en la humillante posición de tener que demostrar que nuestro padre está vivo mientras nuestra madre vive con su nuevo esposo, lord Secundas, y se apodera del negocio familiar. ¡Le rogamos que devuelva a lord Molles su vida y su buen nombre! Espera su decisión en la Capilla de la Paciencia».

«Mi{mf|lord|lady}, nuestro padre sobrevivió. Había sido capturado por piratas, que iban a pedir rescate, pero la Armada Imperial logró abordar la nave y rescatarlo. Sin embargo, en el momento de su desaparición, nuestra madre encargó un certificado de defunción antes de que recibiéramos las buenas noticias. Ahora nos vemos en la humillante posición de tener que demostrar que nuestro padre está vivo mientras nuestra madre se da la gran vida con su nuevo esposo, lord Secundas, y se apodera del negocio familiar. ¡Le rogamos que devuelva a lord Molles su vida y su buen nombre! Espera su decisión en la Capilla de la Paciencia».

languages.text: 「閣下、父は確かに生き延びました。彼は本当に海賊に捕らえられ、身代金を要求されるはずだったのですが、帝国海軍がその船に突入し、彼を救出したのです。父が行方不明になった後、私たちがその知らせを受ける前に、母のレディ・モレスが死亡証明書を手配しました。その結果、今の私たちは父が生きていることを証明しなければならないという、屈辱的な立場に置かれています。一方、母は新しい夫であるセクンダス卿と生活を送り、私たちの家業を乗っ取っています。モレス公の命と名前を回復してください！彼は忍耐の礼拝堂で、あなたの決定を謙虚に待っています」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, our father did survive. He really was captured by pirates, who were going to demand ransom, but the Imperial Navy managed to board the ship and rescue him. After he went missing, our mother, Lady Molles, arranged for a death certificate before we received the good news. Now, we are in the humiliating position of having to prove that our father is alive, while our mother is living with her new husband, Lord Secundas, and has taken over our family business. We implore you to restore Lord Molles to his life and name! He is humbly awaiting your decision in the Chapel of Patience."

traits.locale_text: 「閣下、父は確かに生き延びました。彼は本当に海賊に捕らえられ、身代金を要求されるはずだったのですが、帝国海軍がその船に突入し、彼を救出したのです。父が行方不明になった後、私たちがその知らせを受ける前に、母のレディ・モレスが死亡証明書を手配しました。その結果、今の私たちは父が生きていることを証明しなければならないという、屈辱的な立場に置かれています。一方、母は新しい夫であるセクンダス卿と最高の生活を送り、私たちの家業を乗っ取っています。モレス公の命と名前を回復してください！彼は忍耐の礼拝堂で、あなたの決定を謙虚に待っています」

「閣下、父は確かに生き延びました。彼は本当に海賊に捕らえられ、身代金を要求されるはずだったのですが、帝国海軍がその船に突入し、彼を救出したのです。父が行方不明になった後、私たちがその知らせを受ける前に、母のレディ・モレスが死亡証明書を手配しました。その結果、今の私たちは父が生きていることを証明しなければならないという、屈辱的な立場に置かれています。一方、母は新しい夫であるセクンダス卿と最高の生活を送り、私たちの家業を乗っ取っています。モレス公の命と名前を回復してください！彼は忍耐の礼拝堂で、あなたの決定を謙虚に待っています」

languages.text: "{mf|Lordum|Leydim}, babamız hayatta. Korsanlarca esir alındığı doğru. Amaçları fidye istemekti ancak İmparatorluk Donanması gemiye çıkıp babamızı kurtardı. O kaybolduktan sonra annemiz Leydi Molles, biz müjdeli haberi almadan önce ölüm belgesi düzenletmiş. Babamızın hayatta olduğunu kanıtlamak gibi küçük düşürücü bir zahmete girmek zorunda kaldık. Annemiz ise aile işletmemizi ele geçirmiş, yeni kocası Lord Secundas ile yaşıyor. Lord Molles'in can ve nam itibarının iadesinin yapılması adına size yalvarıyoruz! Sabır Şapeli'nde suspus kararınızı bekliyor."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, our father did survive. He really was captured by pirates, who were going to demand ransom, but the Imperial Navy managed to board the ship and rescue him. After he went missing, our mother, Lady Molles, arranged for a death certificate before we received the good news. Now, we are in the humiliating position of having to prove that our father is alive, while our mother is living with her new husband, Lord Secundas, and has taken over our family business. We implore you to restore Lord Molles to his life and name! He is humbly awaiting your decision in the Chapel of Patience."

O kaybolduktan sonra annemiz Leydi Molles, biz müjdeli haberi almadan önce ölüm belgesi düzenletmiş. Babamızın hayatta olduğunu kanıtlamak gibi küçük düşürücü bir zahmete girmek zorunda kaldık. Annemiz ise aile işletmemizi ele geçirmiş, yeni kocası Lord Secundas ile yaşıyor. Lord Molles'in can ve nam itibarının iadesinin yapılması adına size yalvarıyoruz! Sabır Şapeli'nde suspus kararınızı bekliyor."

"{mf|Lordum|Leydim}, babamız hayatta. Korsanlar tarafından esir alındığı doğru. Amaçları fidye istemekti ancak İmparatorluk Donanması gemiye çıkıp onu kurtarmayı başardı. O kaybolduktan sonra annemiz Leydi Molles, biz müjdeli haberi almadan önce bir ölüm belgesi düzenletmiş. Babamızın hayatta olduğunu kanıtlamak gibi küçük düşürücü bir zahmete girmek zorunda kaldık. Annemiz ise aile işletmemizi ele geçirmiş, yeni kocası Lord Secundas ile sefasını sürüyor. Lord Molles'in can ve nam itibarının iadesinin yapılması adına size yalvarıyoruz! Sabır Şapeli'nde suspus kararınızı bekliyor."
